attributes.action: THINK AGAIN ON MAKING THE MOTORIST RESPONSIBLE FOR THERE ACCIDENTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this if you agree that this can not work due to it being prejudged against the motorist, blame should never be put on them until the full facts have been taken, there are youths/children who ride out into the road from footpaths, undertake weave in and out which all these are against the road traffic acts.

Trust there will be support.
